name: Group 1 - Time To Reflect - Group Project Assignment 2
name_original: Group 1 - Time To Reflect - Group Project Assignment 2
description:
Only compatible with an Xbox Controller

Move - Left Stick

Shield - Right Stick

Jump - Right bumper

Manoeuvre through a deadly prison with lethal guards and turrets using your trusty shield to make your escape.

A shooting game with no shooting!

By Brad Pablo, Ben Carter, Nick Bowen and Giles Margerum
